original_title: Message of the Forest. Towards 'O Horizon'
overview: Message of the Forest can be heard as an ode to the Sal Forests of West Bengal, or a song for the weathering of parent rocks, or an incantation inspired by Rabindranath Tagoreâ€™s vision of a world cam- pus that would become Visva-Bharati in Santineketan in West Bengal in 1921.
title: Message of the Forest. Towards 'O Horizon'
